page.title: 13Schools.
page.content: In Market Lavington there are two schools,{St Barnabas Primary}and {Lavington Comprehensive}School.St Barnabas School was opened in 1971 and is between the villages of Market Lavington and Easterton.It is a single storey brick and glass building with a playground and playing field.At St Barnabas School,there are 166 children including the infants,six teachers and a Headmaster.You start there when you are five years old and finish when you are eleven.Most children from St Barnabas,go on to Lavington Comprehensive School which is between the villages of Market Lavington and West Lavington .This is also a brick and glass building but it has several storeys.There is an outdoor swimming pool.Children from all the surrounding villages attend Lavington School.
